casebody.data:
John Petersen, Appellant v. John Swan, Respondent. Decided June 27, 1890. Appeal by plaintiff from a judgment in favor of defendant, entered upon a verdict directed by the court. Hart & Price, for appellant. James K. Hill, Wing & Shoudy, for respondent.

Before Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

*586Judgment affirmed, with costs, on the authority of 53 N. Y. Superior Ct. R. 151.
